Summary: 3 sphereic shape objects flying over my head in a triangular pattern the two on the end were moving like no objects of this earth can move
divs: Sighting Details3 sphereic shape objects flying over my head in a triangular pattern. the two on the end were moving like no objects of this earth can move. they were metalic spheres no lights that i could see but there was some light reflecting off it. I am not the only witteness to this event, my brother was with me in my back yard when we saw them flying over head. we were outside smoking a cigerett and looking at the stars wehen we notice it.
